en.UI_HOME_DES_1: Hello everyone, Earth will be the destination of today's class field trip
en.UI_HOME_DES_2: We will learn about the cycling of matter and energy on earth
en.UI_HOME_DES_3: Follow me, let's explore this wonderful planet together
en.UI_EXPLORE_HOME_1: Earth is a complex system of interacting subsystems: the geosphere, hydrosphere, atmosphere, and biosphere.
en.UI_EXPLORE_HOME_3: Select the items on the screen to learn about each system
en.UI_EXPLORE_HYDRO_DES_INTRO: the following terrains belong to Hydrosphere
en.UI_EXPLORE_HYDRO_DES_1: Earth's water in liquid, ice, oceans, rivers, lakes, glaciers and groundwater.
en.UI_EXPLORE_GEO_DES_INTRO: The following terrains belong to Geosphere
en.UI_EXPLORE_GEO_DES_1: Includes a hot and mostly metallic inner core: a mantle of hot, soft, solid rock and a crust of rock, soil and sediments
en.UI_EXPLORE_BIOS_DES_INTRO: The following terrains belong to Biosphere
en.UI_EXPLORE_ATMOS_DES_INTRO: the following terrains belong to Atmosphere
en.UI_EXPLORE_ATMOS_DES_1: Air, all of the gases surrounding the Earth
en.UI_JIGSAW_DES_1: Drag and drop the icons below into the correct categories to continue!
en.UI_LDSP_D1:
Let's fly to earth together. 
 Please avoid the satellites around the earth to be able to land safely.
en.UI_EARTH_DES_1: Wow, The earth is so beautiful! We will learn a lot of new things here
en.UI_EARTH_BOOK_D1: All the information you need is in this book, Find the items and start our lesson. Let's go!
en.UI_EARTH_WAVE_D1: Water waves from the ocean shape coastal landforms.
en.UI_EARTH_RIVER_D1: Weather conditions, such as rainfall, can shape the landforms on Earth through weathering and erosion
en.UI_EARTH_MOUNTAIN_D2: Do you know that : Erosion is the process by which rock, soil, and/or sediments are transported from one location to another
en.UI_EARTH_CLOUD_D1: Take a look at those beautiful clouds are floating in the sky. In the water cycle, water vapor in the atmosphere cools and condenses to form clouds
en.UI_EARTH_CLOUD_D2: The Sun provides heat energy that causes the water cycle to flow on Earth. Water can flow between the ground, air, and organisms on Earth in many different pathways through the water cycle
en.UI_EARTH_SUN_D1: In the water cycle, heat energy from the Sun, causes water in the ocean to increase in temperature and evaporate into a gas
en.UI_EARTH_SUN_D2:
Climate describes the typical weather conditions in an area over a long period of time. 
 If there is no rain for a long time, the heat from the sun will dry the land
en.UI_EARTH_FISH_D1:
That fish is swimming fast!! 
 - The ocean supports a variety of ecosystems and organisms. 
 - Weather and climate affect the types of living things found in a region.
en.UI_EARTH_COMPLETED: WE HAD SUCH A GOOD TIME HERE ON EATH! IT'S TIME TO GO HOME, GUYS!
en.UI_HELICOPTER_DES1: We had such a good time here on earth ! It's time to go home, Guys!
en.UI_HELICOPTER_DES2: CLICK and HOLD LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to go up, release to go down
en.UI_HELI_FACE_OBSTACLE: Oh no! There is an obstacle in front of us! What should we do?
en.UI_WIN_THANKS_FOR: Thanks for your learning with us.
